languages.text: While at maximum stacks of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} gains +7 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
languages.original_text: При максимальном числе {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}знаков стойкости{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангард{/g} получает +7 к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}.

traits.locale_text: While at maximum stacks of unyielding beacon, the Vanguard gains +7 resolve.

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不灭明光{/g}叠加至最大层数时，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}获得+7{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。

languages.text: Cuando tiene las acumulaciones máximas de {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Dechado de firmeza{/g}, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g} gana +7 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}brío{/g}.

languages.text: Lorsqu'il atteint le nombre maximum de cumuls de {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Guide Inflexible{/g}, le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Patrouilleur{/g} bénéficie de +7 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g}.
